name: The Sea Won't Stop [A short text adventure]
name_original: The Sea Won't Stop [A short text adventure]
description:
You are a pirate captain, and there is a large hole in the side of the ship. 
Can you stop it sinking?  No. 
But you can try.

This is a short [1-2 minute] text adventure, made in Twine. It was made for Ludum Dare 50, on the theme "Delay the Inevitable".
